resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207084</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mapping My Spot in History</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm meines Punktes in der Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tracer ma tache dans l'histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traçando meu ponto no history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracciato del mio punto nella storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρτογράφηση του σημείου μου στην ιστορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asociar mi punto en historia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students become proficient at observing and interpreting maps, learn architectural and cartographic terms, appreciate their own role in affecting history, and contribute to a panoramic map of their town.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer werden in beobachtenden und 
deutenkarten tüchtig, erlernen die architektonischen und 
kartographischen Bezeichnungen, schätzen ihre eigene Rolle, wenn sie 
Geschichte beeinflussen, und tragen zu einer panoramischen Karte ihrer
Stadt bei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides deviennent compétents dans
les cartes observantes et d'interprétations, apprennent des limites 
architecturales et cartographiques, apprécient leur propre rôle en 
affectant l'histoire, et contribuent à une carte panoramique de leur 
ville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas tornam-se proficientes em
mapas observando e de interpretação, aprendem-se termos 
architectural e cartographic, apreciam-se seu próprio papel em afetar
o history, e contribuem-se a um mapa panoramic de sua cidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti diventano competenti nei 
programmi d'osservazione e d'interpretazione, imparano i termini 
architettonici e cartografici, apprezzano il loro proprio ruolo 
nell'interessare la storia e contribuiscono ad un programma panoramico
della loro città.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να γίνουν ικανούς στην 
παρατήρηση και την ερμηνεία των χαρτών, να μάθουν τους 
αρχιτεκτονικούς και χαρτογραφικούς όρους, να εκτιμήσουν το ρόλο 
τους στην επιρροή της ιστορίας, και να συμβάλουν σε έναν 
πανοραμικό χάρτη της πόλης τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas hacen peritos en las
correspondencias de observación y que interpretan, aprenden términos
arquitectónicos y cartográficos, aprecian su propio papel en afectar
historia, y contribuyen a una correspondencia panorámica de su 
ciudad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207084</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102887</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mapping-my-spot-in-history</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
